uniol.apt.analysis.separation

Class SeparationLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.separation.SeparationLogic

  • public class SeparationLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class computes if a net is strongly or weakly separable with respect to k.
    Author:
    Daniel

    • Constructor Detail

      • SeparationLogic

        public SeparationLogic(PetriNet petriNet,
                       boolean stronglyCheck,
                       long initK,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> chosenFiringSequence,
                       int maxLength,
                       boolean fullOutput)
                throws UnboundedException
        Class constructor. Note: We check every possible firable sequence -- using Coverabily Class, so unbounded nets will be sorted out. Main idea is to compute reachability graph for net with marking k*M0 (rg_kM0) and reachability graph with marking M0 (rg_M0). Strongly separation: Try to realize every sequence of rg_kM0 with sequences from rg_M0. Sequences from rg_M0 can be used k times. It is allowed to switch between sequences of rg_M0 but the order in a sequence must not be changed. Weakly separation: Same as strongly but here the order in a sequence can be changed.
        Parameters:
        petriNet - Net which will be checked
        stronglyCheck - check strong or weakly
        initK - Value for k, k == 0 -> compute the maximum k and use it. k must be "ok" - see separation class
        chosenFiringSequence - check this given firing sequence - null for unused
        maxLength - check all sequences up this length - must be greater than 0 - unused if chosenFiringSequence was set
        fullOutput - outputs every firing sequence
        Throws:
        UnboundedException - Unbounded exception

    • Method Detail

      • computeSeparation

        public final void computeSeparation(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> chosenFiringSequence,
                                    boolean stronglyCheck,
                                    boolean fullOutput)
                             throws UnboundedException
        This method compute the separation. Will be called after class constructor initialized parameter.
        Parameters:
        chosenFiringSequence - chosenFiringSequence check this given firing sequence - null for unused
        stronglyCheck - true: checks strongly, false: check weakly
        fullOutput - fullOutput outputs every firing sequence
        Throws:
        UnboundedException - Unbounded exception

        This returns result.

        Output
